title: Davidson's Essentials of Medicine - 2nd Ed (2015).pdf Gooner
description:
Davidson's Essentials of Medicine - 2nd Edition (2015).pdf Gooner

Publisher: Churchill Livingstone; 2 edition (July 24, 2015)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0702055921
ISBN-13: 978-0702055928

For over half a century Davidsonâ€™s Principles and Practice of Medicine has informed and educated students, doctors and other health professionals all over the world, providing a comprehensive account of the practice of medicine. Davidsonâ€™s Essentials of Medicine provides the core content of the main textbook in a condensed format which will be invaluable whenever you are on the move - whether commuting, travelling between training sites, or on electives.

* This book provides a distillation of the core information required for clinical studies in medicine. While retaining the acclaimed readability of the main textbook it presents the key information in a format more appropriate for practical clinical work.

* The contents have been carefully selected by a team of junior doctors, emphasising only the topics that will be essential for clinical studies.

* The book includes additional chapters of content to aid clinical practice including a practically-focussed chapter on therapeutics and a useful guide to interpreting major clinical investigations.

* The text draws directly on the depth and breadth of experience of the Davidsonâ€™s authors and its International Advisory Board.

* Updated to include key changes and new illustrations included in Davidsonâ€™s Principles and Practice of Medicine
